sentences.en: An accessory is merely a piece of iconography, used to express individual identity.
sentences.cn: 首饰只不过是一件造型, 用来表达个人的个性.

sentences.en: Analyse the clinical. iconography and histopathology feature of 15 cases pulmonary inflammatory pseudinoma approved by pathology.
sentences.cn: 目的分析肺炎性假瘤15例的临床、影像学及病理组织学的特征.

sentences.en: Iconography is a common application of this strategy.
sentences.cn: 此外,运用图标也是一种不错的方法.

sentences.en: Major curriculums: C and C ++ Language, Software Engineering, Computer Application, Computer Graphics and Iconography, Database, etc.
sentences.cn: 专课程: C及C++语言, 软件工程, 计算机应用, 计算机图形图像学, 数据库等.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the characteristics of clinic and iconography in cerebral schistosomiasis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨脑血吸虫病的临床及CT、 MRI特点.

sentences.en: The oblique rays of the sun on the orchards create this typical landscape that traditional iconography would associate with an earthly paradise.
sentences.cn: 阳光撒在果园里形成了独特的景致,就像传统肖像画中描绘的天堂.

sentences.en: What is semiotic iconography of cheese?
sentences.cn: 奶酪的象征意义是什么?

words.tran_cn: 图标；偶像；肖像，画像；圣像

trans.tran_cn: 图解，插图，画像研究，（对一个人的）肖像研究
trans.tran_en: The iconography of a group of people consists of the symbols, pictures, and objects that represent their ideas and way of life
